description: This table stores audit information for changes to therapy plans.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PLAN_OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the parent order template record that is affected by the change in this row.

columns.name: INTERVAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the interval. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Every visit


Weekly


Every two weeks


Monthly


Quarterly


PRN


Once


Every three weeks


Every four weeks


Every five weeks


Every six weeks


Twice per week


Three times per week


Selected dates


Selected treatments


Daily


Every eight weeks

columns.name: REQ_TOTAL_COUNT
columns.description: The count of treatments requested for the affected order template.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The initial date on which the affected order template may be shown to be due.

columns.name: ORDER_CAT_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for order category associated with the order template in this row. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other

columns.name: CHANGE_DTTM_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the change audited in this row was made.

columns.name: CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This identifies the user making the change audited in this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: CHANGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the type of change audited in this row. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Propagation - New order


Propagation - Plan to day


Propagation - Day to plan


Added order


Removed order


Released order


Cancel release


Schedule changed


Order changed (plan)


Order changed (day)


Schedule and order changed


Due date adjustment


Reactivated order


Signature expired


Defer until date adjustment


Plan start date adjustment


Completed order


Unsigned order

columns.name: CONTEXT_OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the child order template affected by the change in this row. This value will only be present for certain types of changes.

columns.name: TREAT_DIST_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category item, stores the changes to the treatment distribution type.  Changes stored for reporting purposes.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Any Day


Specific Days


Specific Day of Month


Specific Day of Week

columns.name: INTER_DET_DESC_HX
columns.description: Stores the changes to the interval details description item.  Changes stored for reporting purposes.

columns.name: NEXT_DUE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the history of next due date of the linked order.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the history of end date for an order after which the order should be completed.
